ancestral_charge.effect: Furious Charge summons an Ancient warrior who charges with you. Furious Charge Damage +18.0%

battle_fervor.effect: War Cry grants 20% Attack Speed for 4.8s

blood_rage.effect: Frenzy deals 5% increased damage per stack. Maximum 5 stacks

bold_chieftain.effect: War Cry's radius is increased by 25%. Duration +1.2s

breaker_of_shields.effect: Ground Stomp destroys enemy shields and deals 50% increased damage to them

deathless_fury.effect: While Undying Rage is active, you deal 25% increased damage

eager_maelstrom.effect: Whirlwind's Energy cost is reduced by 20% while Berserking

earthen_might.effect: Ground Stomp generates 25 Fury for each enemy hit

endless_death.effect: Cleave's Bleed duration is increased by 3s

flesh_rending.effect: Cleave's Bleed damage is increased by 30%

furious_impulse.effect: Furious Charge's cooldown is reduced by 1s for each enemy hit

guttural_roar.effect: War Cry also increases your damage by 15% for 4.8s

hammer_of_the_ancients.effect: Hammer of the Ancients has a 15% chance to summon an Ancient warrior who attacks with you

heavy_handed.effect: Hammer of the Ancients deals 40% increased damage but attacks 20% slower

perpetual_stamina.effect: Sprint's Fury cost is reduced by 50%

power_in_numbers.effect: War Cry's effect is increased by 5% for each affected ally

rage_of_the_berserker.effect: While Berserking, your Critical Strike Chance is increased by 25%

ramaladnis_magnum_opus.effect: Hammer of the Ancients always Critical Strikes but deals 25% less damage

swiftness.effect: Sprint's Movement Speed bonus is increased by 25%

tearing_whirlwind.effect: Whirlwind deals 30% increased damage to Bleeding enemies

the_butchers_cleaver.effect: Cleave has a 20% chance to cause enemies to explode on death

the_slayers_strength.effect: Cleave deals 40% increased damage to enemies below 30% Life

unconstrained_rage.effect: Wrath of the Berserker's duration is increased by 2s

violent_rupture.effect: Ground Stomp creates an earthquake that deals 100% weapon damage over 3s

warriors_rancor.effect: While Berserking, your damage is increased by 2% for each 10 Fury spent
